import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { readingTracker } from '../services/readingTracker'; import ReadingTracker from '../components/ReadingTracker'; import { FaChartBar, FaNewspaper, FaBookOpen, FaClock, FaFire } from 'react-icons/fa'; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const [showTracker, setShowTracker] = useState(false); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalArticles: 0, totalReadingTime: 0, currentStreak: 0, totalSessions: 0 }); useEffect(() => { const readingStats = readingTracker.getStats(); setStats({ totalArticles: readingStats.totalArticles, totalReadingTime: readingStats.totalReadingTime, currentStreak: readingStats.currentStreak, totalSessions: readingStats.totalSessions }); }, []); return (

); }; export default HomePage;
